review_body: Skype has always worked amazingly for me but as of last night it wouldnt load my chat history and now it won't chats I'm in, profile pics won't load, messages won't send. I have no setting changes that could've caused this. It happened out of nowhere. I reported the issue twice and they were absolut...Full ReviewSkype has always worked amazingly for me but as of last night it wouldnt load my chat history and now it won't chats I'm in, profile pics won't load, messages won't send. I have no setting changes that could've caused this. It happened out of nowhere. I reported the issue twice and they were absolutely no help. I've uninstalled/reinstalled 3 times. I've restarted my phone several times, I've restarted Skype several times. I've done everything I can think of and nothing will fix it.

This app has fallen down so much since its heyday. It's slow, annoying, lacks useful features. Also, it cannot be considered really private and secure. What a pity. I'd suggest users check out Telegram, the most promising messenger, full of useful features, fast, secure, private, that really cares what its users want and is a joy to use.

My experience with Skype (for the past 2 months) has been very good! I use Skype with an LG K30, LG K8, Acer Windows 10, Amazon H8 and H10. Android App (April), Windows Metro App and Web version works good. NO COMPLAINTS. All notifications work. Clear calls. File transfers go through right away. Mak...Full ReviewMy experience with Skype (for the past 2 months) has been very good! I use Skype with an LG K30, LG K8, Acer Windows 10, Amazon H8 and H10. Android App (April), Windows Metro App and Web version works good. NO COMPLAINTS. All notifications work. Clear calls. File transfers go through right away. Make sure you adjust your phone settings properly (allow all notifications) and then adjust the skype settings (allow all permisions and all notifications). Battery optimization apps tend to mess things.

I use this on my mobile and on a google chromebook, my only real annoyance would be that if I receive a call it will only ring on my mobile. whereas Facebook calls rings on every device i am logged in on. So if I am at home I need to log out on my mobile so I can answer calls on the chromebook which...Full ReviewI use this on my mobile and on a google chromebook, my only real annoyance would be that if I receive a call it will only ring on my mobile. whereas Facebook calls rings on every device i am logged in on. So if I am at home I need to log out on my mobile so I can answer calls on the chromebook which I prefer to use, but I need to remember to log back in on mobile if I go out as I don't want to miss important calls. In addition the mobile version has the option to only receive calls on that device, but the chromebook one does not. Fairly annoying. Other than that it does what it says on the tin, a bit basic. I only use this to contact family members who aren't on Facebook Messenger.

App could be simpler, but that is not so easy due to the complex capabilities it provides. Skype reliability/features constantly improve I'm using a Skype number in the US and that appears to work seamlessly except in the most important case of MFA since most institutions don't support the tech requ...Full ReviewApp could be simpler, but that is not so easy due to the complex capabilities it provides. Skype reliability/features constantly improve I'm using a Skype number in the US and that appears to work seamlessly except in the most important case of MFA since most institutions don't support the tech required. Note this is the cae with other competing services as well, so not a unique Skype problem. Though most services support video, none really support the breadth of Skype, including translation.

My cell plan charges a lot for calls from Canada to the US, and Skype is my go-to for those calls. It's easy, call quality is as good as a phone call and it's super cheap to call a phone number, instead of Skype to Skype. The quality of video calls is usually fine too, unless I'm somewhere with weak...Full ReviewMy cell plan charges a lot for calls from Canada to the US, and Skype is my go-to for those calls. It's easy, call quality is as good as a phone call and it's super cheap to call a phone number, instead of Skype to Skype. The quality of video calls is usually fine too, unless I'm somewhere with weak wifi, then the connection is often cut off. The underlying VOIP technology is great, but the interface on Android is a mess. A call comes through, and it's a crapshoot as to what sort of experience I'll get trying to answer. It will either be in walkie-talkie mode SCREAMING in my ear, or it might be at normal phone volume. Then good luck actu...Full ReviewThe underlying VOIP technology is great, but the interface on Android is a mess. A call comes through, and it's a crapshoot as to what sort of experience I'll get trying to answer. It will either be in walkie-talkie mode SCREAMING in my ear, or it might be at normal phone volume. Then good luck actually ending the call. Notifications come many minutes after a missed call, or you'll get missed call notifications hours after a successful call. The Skype service seems to have no way of knowing that I'm connected successfully on my PC version of Skype, and will begin ringing - notifying me of a call that I initiated and am currently engaged in. This frustrating experience resulted in this review, as well as me uninstalling the app.

For $6.99 per month, you can buy unlimitted calls to landlines and cell phones in the USA, and then call the USA from anywhere in the world. This is an excellent deal.

Skype (Now owned by Microsoft) abuse their power. Sometimes Spam/Threatening links are sent by Contacts whose Systems have been compromised (So its not really them sending it). You the User cannot delete ANY Content. If you delete the Contact, the old Contact and Dangerous link stays on your device....Full ReviewSkype (Now owned by Microsoft) abuse their power. Sometimes Spam/Threatening links are sent by Contacts whose Systems have been compromised (So its not really them sending it). You the User cannot delete ANY Content. If you delete the Contact, the old Contact and Dangerous link stays on your device. I ask you, what gives them the RIGHT to do this, and exert this level of control? This can cause huge mental trauma, most people will want the right to delete this (And any other) content, out of their life and be gone with it.
